reviewText: The Repossession is a live filming of SMG as a crew @BB Kings in NY!The club was packed wall to wall with legendary artist & the video is high quality footage! If your a supporter of Iceberg,Smoothe Da Hustler or Trigga Tha Gambler look for the full length album SMG you will not be disappointed!1 of the greatest rap groups put together BKLYN 2 Berlin & back again...Global Domination

This DVD truly captivates what life is like as a hardcore rapper.  The bonus features and interviews with ICE-T and his crew were great! Not to mention the live performance at the BB King! If you are a hardcore rap fan or just interested in life on the road as a rockstar, this DVD is for you!! THIS DVD ROCKS!

Yo this dvd is the bomb dawg, it kicks mad flava, i's not finna done lie to you, this tracks is crazy on the real killa. Im finna bust shots cos these mengs is so dope, holla holla. Ice dawg is back rocking like the old days, smoothe and trig get mad props fo real and maerk live busts it fo real on the rep, check it. If you claims hip hop and run with a set then buy this peeps, its the bomb dawg
